name: js-reactjs-template
description: 1. Create project folder. 2. Initialize     ```     npm init -y     ```     This will create `package.json` file. 3. Install core libraries of react.     ```     npm install react react-dom     ``` 4. install development tools     a. webpack:         ```         npm install --save-dev webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server         ```     b. babel:         ```         npm install --save-dev babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react         ```     c. html-webpack-plugin:         ```         npm install --save-dev html-webpack-plugin         ```     Explanation of Tools:         - webpack: Bundles JS files

scripts.predeploy: npm run build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html
